stages.title: Define Your Psychology Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in clinical, cognitive, social, or research psychology, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top psychology programs value strong science foundations, research experience, and genuine interest in understanding human behavior.
checklist: Research 5-7 top psychology programs (Harvard, Oxford, Cambridge, Stanford, UCL)
Identify your interest (clinical, cognitive, social, developmental, neuroscience)
Assess your biology, math, and research preparation
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting academics, research, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, research experience, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Research reach, target, and safety schools for psychology
Note AP Psychology and Biology requirements
Plan your Common App personal statement theme
Identify research opportunities or summer programs

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, TSA, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for Oxford, Cambridge, UCL psychology

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula to global standards while developing research mindset.
checklist: Review psychology topics in IB HL or national exams
Explore summer programs or research abroad
Document interest in specific psychology fields

quiz.q: What do top psychology programs value most?
opts: Strong academics + research experience + genuine interest in human behavior
quiz.correct: Strong academics + research experience + genuine interest in human behavior

stages.title: Gain Research & Practical Experience
stages.description: Develop research skills and gain experience in psychology through studies, volunteering, or internships.

Global.overview: Demonstrate psychology interest through research participation, volunteering, or practical experience.
checklist: Participate in psychology research (as participant or assistant)
Volunteer in mental health, education, or social services
Read psychology research papers and journals

resources.title: How to Get Psychology Research Experience

projectIdeas: Conduct a small psychology experiment or survey
Volunteer at a mental health organization
Create a psychology blog or podcast

US.overview: Link experiences to research programs and applications.
checklist: Apply to psychology research programs or internships

UK.overview: Integrate experiences into EPQ or UCAS statement.
checklist: Draft EPQ proposal on psychology topic
Link experiences to university research themes
Prepare to discuss research in interviews

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate psychology interest?
opts: Research participation, volunteering, and reading psychology literature
quiz.correct: Research participation, volunteering, and reading psychology literature

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in biology, mathematics, and psychology coursework.

Global.overview: Strong science and math preparation is essential for psychology.
checklist: Maintain strong grades in sciences and math
Complete AP Psychology and AP Biology
Achieve A* in A-level Psychology or Biology

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for psychology?

stages.title: Craft Your Psychology Narrative
stages.description: Translate your experiences and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your psychology passion, research, and achievements.
checklist: Get feedback from psychology teachers or mentors
Draft Common App essay with psychology focus
Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App
Draft reflection on psychology career goals

quiz.q: What should your psychology personal statement highlight?
opts: Genuine interest in human behavior, research experiences, and empathy
quiz.correct: Genuine interest in human behavior, research experiences, and empathy

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

checklist: Prepare to discuss research and experiences

opts: Clear explanation of research and genuine interest in human behavior
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of research and genuine interest in human behavior
